---
title: "Dear Data"
description: |
  Dear Data was originally a project developed by Data Scientists Giorgia Lupi and Stafanie Posavec to analyze data in their daily lives using a postcard format. In my Data Visualization class (HIA 0229) we used the principles of the Dear Data project to analyze data in our daily lives using the same methods. I chose to evaluate the times I check the time each day for one week.

output: distill::distill_article
